page.title: 05Recreation
page.content: Bodyshock In Bodyshock our breakdance crew there are fifteen members.They have special names,such as Wizard,Lastic Legs,and Voyager. On June 2nd. we had an uprock. An uprock is competition between two rock crews. There are special moves in Breakdancing.Rock Stead flips are when a strong person locks his hands together and flips you backwards into a somersault and you land on your feet.Backflips are gymnastic moves. All breakers dance to music. There are special types of music,such as Rap,which is a speeded up version of Reggae Clothes that breakers wear are usually Nike or Puma tracksuits and special training shoes.
